general.meta.desc: Bachelor of Applied Informatics, currently freelancing in web development. Always looking to learn new things. I love movies, video games, and challenges.
cookies.title: Cookie consent
cookies.text: This website uses analytic cookies to help understand how people interact with it. If you wish to help improve the experience in the future, consider accepting :)
bio.text.line.1: Bachelor of Applied Informatics, currently freelancing in web development / design.
bio.text.line.2: Started with WordPress in 2020, then moved onto Next.js, React and Tailwind.
bio.text.line.3: Fan of functional programming and clean code. Always looking to learn new things.
bio.text.line.4: I love movies, video games, and challenges - currently learning Japanese (*^â–½^*)
